cab.content: SECRET.Operations..From:-in-C.,France.C. I.G .War Office3rd November, 1917.Handed in 8.14 p.m. Received 9.20 p.m.G.O.C., R.F.C., reportr to me as follows:-"Clouds at a height cf 800 feet and fine rain rendered operations by the Nancy squadrons impossible last nightSecretary,War Cabinet.Forwarded for circalation to the Members of the War Cabinet.General Staff, Vter Office.4th November, 1917.cr to-day.
